emuInput.TitMainTitle: Group portrait of Sarah McClellan, holding son James Kevin McClellan, seated on bed next to daughter Helen Harding, holding daughter Helena Louise Harding, in domestic interior
emuInput.CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, February 25, 1956, pg. 2 reads:"Two Stork Bundles - Mrs. Sarah McClellan and her daughter, Mrs. Helen Harding, both of 7634 Mulford Street, gave birth to children on Feb. 3 at Belvedere Hospital. Mrs. McClellan is shown holding her son, James Kevin McClellan, while daughter Helen cuddles baby girl Helena Louise Harding. - Harris Photo."
